definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics

sentences.english: We need to experience major events like the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要经历奥运这样的大事件。

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫妇在北京参加奥运开幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: But Ryan Reser of the U.S. judo team has never been to the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 但是这位美国柔道选手以前从来没有参加过奥运比赛。

sentences.english: The plain white background of the Olympic flag is symbolic of peace throughout the games .
sentences.chinese: 奥运会五环旗是在顾拜旦主持下制定的。

sentences.english: Aramark has provided catering services at 13 previous Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛客曾为13届奥运会提供过服务。

sentences.english: Dow Jones plans to create an index for the 2010 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 道琼斯公司还计划为2010年冬季奥运会设立指数。

sentences.english: It seemed obvious that China was rehearsing for next year.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，中国似乎是在为明年的奥运会进行彩排。

sentences.english: The central bank issued a commemorative 10-yuan bank note to mark the Beijing Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 央行为纪念北京奥运会将发行10圆面值的纪念钞。

sentences.english: It' really surprises me that Xiao gives me an ticket of Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 确实比较惊喜，老肖居然送我一张奥运门票。

sentences.english: And I'd find a way to make Tim Duncan change his mind about playing in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 邓肯，我得想个办法让他改变主意参加奥运会。

sentences.english: E. G. 1 Hotel accommodation was scarce during the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会期间，旅馆房间很难找。

sentences.english: Sun Weide, spokesman for the Beijing Olympic Organizing Committee, has urged that the Games not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥组委发言人孙维德呼吁不要将奥运会政治化。

sentences.english: Oh, I always thought the Olympics had mixed doubles.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我一直以为奥运会也有混双比赛呢。

sentences.english: A: China did very well in the last Olympics in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 中国在上届雅典奥运会上取得了优异的成绩。

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奥运会境内第一棒火炬手刘翔跑过天安门广场。

sentences.english: There is a Sunken Garden in the central area of the park.
sentences.chinese: 奥运公园的中心区有一个下沉花园广场。

definition: abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Paralympics/same as Paralympic Games 殘奧會|残奥会[Can2 Ao4 hui4]
Olympic organizing committee/abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會組織委員會|奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Yun4 dong4 hui4

definition: Pingchang county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan
Rio/abbr. for 里約熱內盧|里约热内卢[Li3 yue1 re4 nei4 lu2]
agreement between the residents of a 里[li3], an administrative district under a city or town (Tw)
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
